113.movie_name: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof (1958)
113.movie_plot: Brick, an alcoholic ex-football player, drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife, Maggie. His reunion with his father, Big Daddy, who is dying of cancer, jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

131.movie_plot: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

52.movie_plot: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

98.movie_plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

25.movie_plot: Bonnie Parker, a bored waitress falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, robbing cars and banks.

156.movie_plot: The lives and tragedies of rising and fading country music stars in Nashville, TN.

19.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

93.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

51.movie_plot: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

3.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

127.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

95.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

21.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

134.movie_plot: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

108.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

124.movie_plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

146.movie_plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

54.movie_plot: A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.

101.movie_plot: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

159.movie_plot: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

32.movie_plot: Ted Kramer's wife leaves her husband, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.

89.movie_plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

71.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

116.movie_plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

166.movie_plot: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.
